column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Some of the more unique exhibits at Art Institute include Chagall's windows
column2: paperweights and a strange collection of miniature rooms. A few of the notable works of art here include American Gothic
column3: A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte
column4: and Nighthawks. There are also a number of great works from Renoir
column9: Van Gogh... the list goes on. Just do yourself a favor
column10: stop reading this review and go check this place out the next time you're in Chicago.
